CustomField.description: This field is automatically populated with the total number of records that are updated during this job run. Use this value for reporting to assess job performance and identify issues. Do not modify this field, as it is system-generated and critical for accurate reporting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is automatically populated with the total number of records that are updated during this job run. Use this value for reporting to assess job performance and identify issues. Do not modify this field, as it is system-generated and critical for accurate reporting.
CustomField.label: Records Updated
